reviewText: Read description from top to bottom. Never mentioned it is region 2. unable to watch, not worth returning. I threw the DVD in the trash. I just love throwing my money away.

This is in the wrong format for U.S. DVD players. Really upset that it wasn't in the info section or I wouldnt have wasted my money on it. Looks like German and French words on the back of DVD case. Says region error: region code 2 when the disc in.
